Malice stood up and stretched.  He extended a hand to Wolfblade.
"Back in my quarters again?  That cargo netting I found was quite 
comfortable, and good for my back."
He was tired, making the sphere, playing their little drinking game, 
it takes a lot out of a bot.  He figured they would sleep for a while 
and hn get up and mess with their little toy some more.  But 
Wolfblade was fond of suprising him.  He though back a few moments, 
to when Wolfblade stumbled.  Was it really instinct that made him 
catch her?  Or was there something else, something he wouldn't admit 
to himself.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
<shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Yeah, cuz I'm on line for a little bit. Further more, I did it 
> again. worked 16 on friday, worked regular on sat and another 16 on 
> sunday. I'm still getting over all that. Sheesh, it's tough 
catching 
> up on sleep. I didn't sleep sat into sun or anything. I still can't 
> really sleep untill my next day off.
> 
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She yawned herself. "Nap? Nap?" as she yawns, "Well, perhaps. A 
> little rest wouldn't hurt."  She closed her optics and let her had 
> fall. She opened her optics as her head banged against the machine 
> with a loud bang. She sat up and rubbed her forehead. "Nap is a 
good 
> idea, just not here."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > "Well, heating something to about 3000 degrees requires a lot of 
> energy, a lot more to do it twice.  I'd pay big money to see you do 
> the same thing.  So, do you want to get to work on the repulser 
first 
> or..." he paused for another yawn, then finished"...or take a quick 
> nap?" 
> > 
> >  
> > OOC- That was lightning fast!  No one has responded to something 
> that quickly in a while!  Sweet!
> > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > WOlfblade::
> > 
> > "Your tired? the one bot that can pull energy from thin air? Your 
> > tired?"  She smirked, "Never thought I'd ever hear those words be 
> > uttered from your face plates."
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > "Exiting the atmosphere is no problem.  Maybe we can rig a 
> repulser 
> > field to push it out there.  I'm sure we can reconfigure the main 
> > tractor emitter to suit our purposes."
> > > Malice took the generator and check the hole in the sphere for 
> > size.  It would fit, so he fit it inside and plugged it up with 
the 
> > cross section he cut.  He used the sword to seal the hole and the 
> > sphere itself was ready.
> > > "I'm tired.  I use a bunch of energy cutting on this thing."
> > > He let a yawn escape, and rested his weight against the sphere.
> > >  
> > > OOC- You're back!  Yeah!  Remember, beat up your boss!  He 
can't 
> do 
> > that to you!
> > 
> > "In the name of God, I banish these souls of the evil undead into 
> damnation.  May God have mercy, for I have none.  In Jesus' Holy 
> Name, Amen." -Rawl, Hellsing-RPG
